definition: old variant of 愷|恺[kai3]/old variant of 凱|凯[kai3]

sentences.english: He more than smiled. He laughed a lot.
sentences.chinese: 他豈止是微笑，簡直是大笑。
這一觀點豈止是可以理解的。

sentences.english: He more than smiled; he laughed out.
sentences.chinese: 他豈止是微笑，他簡直是大笑了。

sentences.english: He more than smiled; he laughed outright.
sentences.chinese: 他豈止是微笑，簡直是大笑了。

sentences.english: Moist skin is far beyond eight glasses of water per day.
sentences.chinese: 肌膚保溼豈止八杯水那麼簡單。

sentences.english: That guy is more than stupid. He's a dyed-in-the-wool ignoramus .
sentences.chinese: 那傢伙豈止愚蠢，他簡直是徹底無知。

sentences.english: In fact, I was more than willing;
sentences.chinese: 說真的，豈止願意，我簡直就是高興。

sentences.english: Disregard for human life and numbness, is not only the fickleness of the world.
sentences.chinese: 對生命的漠視和麻木，豈止是世態炎涼。

sentences.english: But the prospect of failing to survive was not merely frightening, as she had expected.
sentences.chinese: 可是不能活命的預感，豈止是她預料的可怕而已？

sentences.english: He has more than repaid my kindness.
sentences.chinese: 他豈止是報答了我的幫助。

sentences.english: He is more than a soldier. He is simply a hero.
sentences.chinese: 他豈止是個戰士，簡直是個英雄。

sentences.english: Still, life is on, and here we stand.
sentences.chinese: 豈止是奧運？生活也是。還是那句話。
